name: The Last Light v3
description:
A small game about a dark world where the last light is about to die. And your mission is too keep the power of the flame alive as long as possible.

My second ludum dare and game jame entry so far :)

Controls

Press W to Jump, A to walk left and D to walk right, 

Use the mouse to shoot bolts 

INFO - IMPORTANT

There is an issues with the unity web gl build in edge e.q. inputs getting stuck so player doesn't stop moving + clicking doesn't always respond well, please consider to use the Windows version or use Firefox or Chrome :)
